channel.title: seed germination on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in seed germination on funPlantGenes

item.title: AM1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g58620 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0682800 Gene Symbol: AM1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: ARAG1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g43970 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0657000 Gene Symbol: ARAG1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: BnPHT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnPHT1|4 Gene Name: PHT1 phosphate transporter Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The high-affinity transporter BnPHT1|4|BnPHT1|4 is involved in phosphorus acquisition and mobilization for facilitating seed germination and early seedling growth of Brassica napus.

item.title: BSR-D1;ZFP36
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g32230 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0437200 Gene Symbol: BSR-D1 ZFP36 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CaAIPP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaAIPP1 Gene Name: protein phosphatase 2C 37 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Functional analysis of the pepper protein phosphatase, CaAIPP1, and its interacting partner CaAIRF1: Modulation of ABA signalling and the drought stress response.

item.title: ClBG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C08G153160 Gene Symbol: ClBG1 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: CRISPR/Cas9-mediated mutagenesis of ClBG1 decreased seed size and promoted seed germination in watermelon.

item.title: CsDMP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_1G028660 Gene Symbol: CsDMP Gene Name: DOMAIN OF UNKNOWN FUNCTION 679 MEMBRANE PROTEIN Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Mutating the maternal haploid inducer gene CsDMP in cucumber produces haploids in planta.

item.title: CsMYB4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA003515.1 Gene Symbol: CsMYB4a Gene Name: R2R3-MYB Sg4 member from Camellia sinensis Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYB4a works synergistically with CsIAA4 and participates in regulation of the auxin pathway in stamen.

item.title: CsNIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa017389 Gene Symbol: CsNIP2|1 Gene Name: nodulin-26 like intrinsic protein2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsNIP2|1|CsNIP2|1 is a Plasma Membrane Transporter from Cucumis sativus that Facilitates Urea Uptake When Expressed in Saccharomyces cerevisiae and Arabidopsis thaliana.

item.title: CsSWEET17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSWEET17 Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter 17 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsSWEET1a and CsSWEET17 Mediate Growth and Freezing Tolerance by Promoting Sugar Transport across the Plasma Membrane.

item.title: CsSWEET1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSWEET1a Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsSWEET1a and CsSWEET17 Mediate Growth and Freezing Tolerance by Promoting Sugar Transport across the Plasma Membrane.

item.title: GhCIPK6a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCIPK6a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCIPK6a increases salt tolerance in transgenic upland cotton by involving in ROS scavenging and MAPK signaling pathways.

item.title: GhGLU19A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A04G0109 Gene Symbol: GhGLU19A Gene Name: Glucanase 19 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of GhGLU19 encoding β-1,3-glucanase promotes seed germination in cotton.

item.title: GhGLU19D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G3612 Gene Symbol: GhGLU19D Gene Name: Glucanase 19 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of GhGLU19 encoding β-1,3-glucanase promotes seed germination in cotton.

item.title: GhPOD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhPOD Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Genome Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCAS, GhAPX, GhSDH, and GhPOD, were cloned from cotton complementary DNA, and their expression patterns under stress were analyzed.

item.title: GhVIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhVIP1 Gene Name: bZIP transcription factor 1 Genome: cotton genome (G.

item.title: GhWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.

item.title: GID1;OsGID1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g33730 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0407500 Gene Symbol: GID1 OsGID1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GmFAD7-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmFAD7-1 Gene Name: omega-3 fatty acid desaturase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Genomic sequencing analysis together with searches at the soybean genome database further confirmed that both GmFAD7 genes were located in two different loci within the soybean genome, suggesting that the soybean ω3 plastidial desaturase FAD7 is encoded by two different paralogous genes.

item.title: GmFAD7-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmFAD7-2 Gene Name: omega-3 fatty acid desaturase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Genomic sequencing analysis together with searches at the soybean genome database further confirmed that both GmFAD7 genes were located in two different loci within the soybean genome, suggesting that the soybean ω3 plastidial desaturase FAD7 is encoded by two different paralogous genes.

item.title: GmSIZ1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12g071300 Gene Symbol: GmSIZ1a Gene Name: SUMO E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: SUMO E3 Ligases GmSIZ1a and GmSIZ1b regulate vegetative growth in soybean.

item.title: GmSIZ1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.U020100 Gene Symbol: GmSIZ1b Gene Name: SUMO E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: SUMO E3 Ligases GmSIZ1a and GmSIZ1b regulate vegetative growth in soybean.

item.title: GmSSAcT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18G258000 Gene Symbol: GmSSAcT1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Identify and characterize GmSSAcT1, encoding a BADH-type soyasaponin acetyltransferase that catalyzes three or four consecutive acetylations on type-A soyasaponins in vitro and in planta.

item.title: Gshdz4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Gshdz4 Gene Name: transcription factor hdz4 Genome: Species: Glycine soja Functional Descriptions: A novel Glycine soja homeodomain-leucine zipper (HD-Zip) I gene, Gshdz4, positively regulates bicarbonate tolerance and responds to osmotic stress in Arabidopsis.

item.title: HvRAF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvRAF Gene Name: root abundant factor Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The barley ERF-type transcription factor HvRAF confers enhanced pathogen resistance and salt tolerance in Arabidopsis.

item.title: SlAN11

item.title: TaCIPK23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCIPK23 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 23 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat CBL-interacting protein kinase 23 (TaCIPK23) positively regulates drought stress and ABA responses TaCIPK23-overexpression wheat and Arabidopsis showed an higher survival rate under drought conditions with enhanced germination rate, developed root system, increased accumulation of osmolytes, and reduced water loss rate.

item.title: TaCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCYP707A1 Gene Name: ABA 8’-hydroxylase Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Ectopic expression of TaNCED2A and TaCYP707A1B in Arabidopsis resulted in altered seed ABA level and dormancy with no effect on leaf ABA content and transpirational water loss.

item.title: TaPI4KIIγ
